features.message: Older version of Java Minecraft is now supported when generating commands
Added hints (?) to explain certain options

fixes.message: Multiple subsequent spaces are not handled correctly

features.message: Replaced the old generation algorithm with one based on Minecraft's actual source code

fixes.message: Fixed bug where changing the pagination page to any value higher then 1 could cause no results to be shown after generating commands

changes.message: The changelog has been converted into a collapsible table instead of a popup

notes: The new generation algorithm is more accurate and should provide better results

features.message: You can now export and import your progress

changes.message: Hints are now smaller and have a different icon

features.message: Number of characters and words are now displayed below the textarea

fixes.message: Fixed bug where text output would be incorrectly cropped and sometimes appear merged
